# koco

`koco` is a library to easily access [`kocohub`](https://github.com/kocohub) datasets. <br>
`kocohub` contains **KO**rean **CO**rpus for natural language processing.

## Installation

```
# from pypi
pip install koco

# from source
git clone https://github.com/inmoonlight/koco
cd koco
pip install .
```

## Usage
